name: Neighbourhood Problems in the Afterlife
description:
Neighbourhood problems don’t stop after death. 

Make sure everyone rests next to their loved ones, and avoid reviving old conflicts. It's hard to please everyone.

Controls:

  • Click on the ground to move there.
  • Click on a tombstone to pick it up.
  • Click on a grave to place a tombstone on it.

Complete a level by placing all tombstones on a grave, and having everyone happy.

Created for weekly game jam #76

Theme: afterlife

  • Assets from Kenney
  • Icons from game-icons
  • Music from Free Music Archive
  • Sound effects from OpenGameArt and FreeSound
